page.title: 11AMENITIES IN HOLT
page.content: THERE IS ALSO A RANGE OF GENERAL ITEMS WHICH ARE FOUND IN EVERY VILLAGE:- 1. TELEPHONE BOX-CHURCH STREET 2. TOILETS-GREEN STREET 3. COUNTY CONSTABULARY-BUILT IN 1881. 4. THE ELECTRICAL CONTRACTORS-CHURCH STREET.AN OFFICE. 5. PUBLIC FOOTPATHS-PAST BELLIS'S FOOD STORE IS A FOOTPATH.IT GOES FROM THE MAIN ROAD ,THROUGH BELLIS'S FIELDS AND ALONG THE TOP OF THE SCHOOL FIELD.IT IS A QUICK ROUTE TO THE FARM SHOP. 6.BUS-STOP-WREXHAM ROAD.3 IN HOLT CENTRE. RIGHT-ROUTE TO WREXHAM LEFT-ROUTE TO MALPAS AND EILSON 7. KENYON HALL-USED FOR JUMBLE SALES, TAPP DANCING,DERBY&JOAN AND PARTIES. 8. THE CROSS-THE CROSS IS IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE.IT WAS BUILT IN THE 15th CENTURY AND WAS THE FOCUS OF THE LIFE IN THE TOWN.FAIRS AND MARKETS WERE HELD ANNUALLY.
